      • create

        public static AddressBook create(java.lang.String appnetName,
                                 java.lang.String didTopicId,
                                 java.lang.String vcTopicId,
                                 @Nullable
                                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> appnetDidServers)
        Creates a new AddressBook instance. Does not create the file on Hedera File Service!.
        Parameters:
        appnetName - Name of the appnet.
        didTopicId - TopicID of the DID topic.
        vcTopicId - Topic ID of the Verifiable Credentials topic.
        appnetDidServers - List of appnet API servers.
        Returns:
        The AddressBook.
